# GitLoom

GitLoom is a powerful, intuitive desktop application for weaving through Git history and managing multiple repositories.

Built with Electron, React, and TypeScript, GitLoom provides an elegant visual interface for managing Git repositories, viewing commit history, handling branches, staging changes, and performing common Git operations.
